keyFacts: An internal request for HR information on Michael Thomas, a Material Handler Foreman at MCC New York, was made on August 12, 2019.
Michael Thomas's entire BOP career from 2007 to 2019 was spent at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The request originated from a Verizon Samsung Galaxy smartphone and was directed to the BOP Human Resource Administrator in Philadelphia.
The document shows a timeline of Thomas's BOP positions: entry on 04/01/2007, Correctional Officer from 04/07/2007 to 04/20/2014, and Material Handler Supervisor from 04/20/2014 onward.
